description: I am an IT profissional with an experience of over 10 years in the areas of infrastructure, networks and development. Capable of working in project development by contributing to the architectural guidelines, identifying requirements, implementing and developing solutions that are suited for the project's necessities.

responsabilities.title: Responsabilities
list: Analize and implement alterations considering Sprint definitions
Implement technical alterations that are relevant to the specifications
Planning and development of tests to ensure that the code's alterations meet the requirements and specifications
Deploy the alterations and monitor the impacts after implementing the alterations to the product
Implementation of new functionalities, continuous improvement to the backend. Development of solutions focused on microservices

achivment.title: Professional Achievements
list: Generalized error treatment at an application level
Development of an Admin page to manage resources that were previously managed via hard code.
Implementation of a message delivery platform for sending push notifications

responsabilities.title: Responsabilities
list: Improvement to the code that was implemented by a third party
Implementation of a new scheduling flux for health insurance costumers
Gathering information on the client's needs
Interaction with the customer's technical team

achivment.title: Main Achievements
list: Implementation of liberty development servers rising the team agility
Created a Spring code base for new projects having all dependencies used by client
